text: Best Buy has a ton of 2 in 1's that have Intel Processors

attachments.text: Shop for 2-in-1s at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up.
attachments.fallback: Shop for 2-in-1s at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up.

text: maybe we buy two, and return them when we're done
rob & I are chatting about perhaps doing the laptop on the road (w/ mom) and a TV in a living room (with a object to scan)
and maybe we setup time to chat tomorrow w/ James & Allison re: props
any communication to ram in the meantime? i can ask james/alison now
I think the big question is whether or not a TV in the home & a smaller device in the hotel will work for us (conveniently, I have a TV on a wall that could work)
and if that's the case, we need to sketch up what the scanner looks like and figure out how to  make / procure that device in a week
I think Ram and Jorst would be psyched if we showed the technology in two devices (rather than two laptop/tablets).
Yes to meeting the Visual Aid team tomorrow AM.  If it has to be in the PM, I have to be OOO from 1:45-3:15 but otherwise can be available.
doesnt have to be in pm
i have only 30 minutes, but you guys can carry on w/o me
